General.Name: Choo Bee Metal Industries Bhd
General.Description: Choo Bee Metal Industries Berhad, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells flat-based steel products in Malaysia and other Asian countries. The company operates through two segments, Trading and Manufacturing. It offers angles, pipes, beams, bars, channels, hollow sections, purlins, rails, plates, steel sheet piles, stainless steel products, and wire meshes. The company also fabricates steel products; and trades in hardware and construction materials. Its products are used in building, construction, and infra-structural related sectors, as well as water and general manufacturing industries. Choo Bee Metal Industries Berhad was incorporated in 1971 and is headquartered in Ipoh, Malaysia.
